content: I think I'll go for a mix-and-match approach. I like the idea of adding visual interest and creating a more dynamic look. I'll start by looking for planters with a common thread, like earthy tones or a distressed look. Then, I'll vary the scale and balance the look by mixing different textures and styles. I'll also keep in mind not to overdo it and limit the number of planters to 3-4. Thanks for the tips!
